channel.title: User Agent on Tech Adventures by Tarun Lalwani
channel.description: Recent content in User Agent on Tech Adventures by Tarun Lalwani

item.title: Selenium change User-Agent of different browsers
item.description: Server uses User-Agent string to differentiate between different browsers and devices. Each device + browser combination can have a different name to identify the Browser and its version. Thougth that may not be 100% true in all cases. In this article we will see how to change the user-agent of different browser when automating them using Selenium Changing User-Agent in Internet Explorer Unfortunately there is no good way to change the User-Agent of a IE browser.
